languages.text: "Урбенд, мы знакомы не одно десятилетие, между нами хватало разногласий, но... вы действительно считаете, что мои родичи попрали само понятие о чести и верности?" {n}Голос Абеляра дрожит от гнева.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Урбенд, мы знакомы не одно десятилетие. Вы действительно считаете, что мои родичи попрали само понятие о чести и предали не только Вольного Торговца, но и самих себя?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "We have known each other for many decades now and we have had our fair share of disagreements, but... do you really think my flesh and blood would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Урбенд, мы знакомы не одно десятилетие, между нами хватало разногласий, но... вы действительно считаете, что мои родичи попрали само понятие о чести и верности?" {n}Голос Абеляра дрожит от гнева.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We have known each other for a good few decades now and there was a fair share of discord between us, but... Do you really think that my parents would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is shaking with rage.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have known each other for a good few decades now and there was a fair share of discord between us, but... Do you really think that my parents would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is shaking with rage.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have known each other for a good few decades now and there was a fair share of discord between us, but... Do you really think that my parents would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have known each other for a good few decades now and there was a fair share of discord between us, but... Do you really think that my parents would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have known each other for many decades now and we have had our fair share of disagreements, but... do you really think my flesh and blood would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have known each other for many decades now and we have had our fair share of disagreements, but... do you really think my flesh and blood would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「我々は互いに何十年来の知己です。相応に仲が悪いこともありましたが…私の血肉は栄誉と忠誠の言葉にふさわしい行動をとるつもりがないと、本気でお考えですか？」{n}アベラルドの声は怒りのあまり震えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have known each other for many decades now and we have had our fair share of disagreements, but... do you really think my flesh and blood would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我々は互いに何十年来の知己です。相応に仲が悪いこともありましたが…私の血肉は栄誉と忠誠の言葉にふさわしい行動をとるつもりがないと、本気でお考えですか？」{n}アベラルドの声は怒りのあまり震えている。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我们也算是有几十年的交情了。虽然常常意见不合，但也算得上求同存异……你真的认为，我的血亲会如此践踏荣耀与忠诚吗？”{n}阿贝拉德的声音因愤怒而颤抖。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have known each other for many decades now and we have had our fair share of disagreements, but... do you really think my flesh and blood would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们也算是有几十年的交情了。虽然常常意见不合，但也算得上求同存异……你真的认为，我的血亲会如此践踏荣耀与忠诚吗？”{n}阿贝拉德的声音因愤怒而颤抖。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Nous nous connaissons depuis plusieurs décennies maintenant, et nous avons eu plus d'un désaccord, mais... croyez-vous vraiment que mon propre sang piétinerait ainsi la notion même d'honneur et de loyauté ? » {n}La voix d'Abélard tremble de rage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have known each other for many decades now and we have had our fair share of disagreements, but... do you really think my flesh and blood would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous connaissons depuis plusieurs décennies maintenant, et nous avons eu plus d'un désaccord, mais... croyez-vous vraiment que mon propre sang piétinerait ainsi la notion même d'honneur et de loyauté ? » {n}La voix d'Abélard tremble de rage.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Nos conocemos desde hace varias décadas y es cierto que hemos tenido nuestras desavenencias, pero... ¿en serio cree que mi familia pisotearía de esa manera el sentido del honor y la lealtad?». {n}La voz de Abelard tiembla por la rabia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have known each other for many decades now and we have had our fair share of disagreements, but... do you really think my flesh and blood would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nos conocemos desde hace varias décadas y es cierto que hemos tenido nuestras desavenencias, pero... ¿en serio cree que mi familia pisotearía de esa manera el sentido del honor y la lealtad?». {n}La voz de Abelard tiembla por la rabia.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Wir kannten uns seit vielen Jahrzehnten und hatten gewiss die ein oder andere Meinungsverschiedenheit, aber ... denkt Ihr wirklich, meine Eltern würden die Definition von Ehre und Loyalität mit Füßen treten?" {n}Abelards Stimme bebt vor Zorn.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have known each other for many decades now and we have had our fair share of disagreements, but... do you really think my flesh and blood would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir kennen einander nun seit einigen Jahrzehnten, und es gab reichlich Zwietracht zwischen uns, aber ... Glaubt Ihr wirklich, dass meine Eltern die Definition von Ehre und Loyalität mit Füßen treten würden?" {n}Abelards Stimme bebt vor Zorn.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "On yıllardır tanışığız, birçok konuda fikir ayrılığı yaşadığımız oldu ama... Benim kanımdan birinin onuru ve sadakati ayaklar altına alabileceğine sahiden inanıyor musunuz?" {n}Abelard'ın sesi öfkeden titriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have known each other for many decades now and we have had our fair share of disagreements, but... do you really think my flesh and blood would trample upon the very definition of honour and loyalty?" {n}Abelard's voice is quivering with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "On yıllardır tanışığız, birçok konuda farklı fikirlerimiz oldu ama... onur ve sadakatin tanımına leke süreceğimi sahiden aklınızdan geçirdiniz mi?" {n}Abelard'ın sesi öfkeden titriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
